title: READY 2 LEARN Glitter Foam Stickers - Multicolor Stars - Pack of 168 - Self-Adhesive Stickers for Kids - Glitter Stickers for Scrapbooks and Greeting Cards
description: Create sparkly scenes and personalize your stuff with foam stickers! This sticker pack includes 168 star-shaped stickers in 7 colors and 3 sizes. Colors include silver, gold, green, blue, pink, purple and red. These self-adhesive stickers easily peel away from their wax sheets for frustration-free craft time. These 3D stickers are durable, thick and easy to hold. Use these stickers to decorate DIY projects or personalize water bottles, computers, phones and more! Give these stickers as rewards after chores and homework. Or, use them as party favors and stocking stuffers. Kids will love to collect all the different glitter star stickers! || Size of largest star: 1.6”L || Size of smallest star: 0.6”L.
